channel.title: Why does this happen?
channel.description:
I got bored and me and some friends decided to play some other online game.
So here's the thing, when I was playing sometimes it minimizes [it's a full screen game] When I'm on the desktop either my RunServer is just gone outa' nowhere or I look in it and see the server crashed.
If I try and start it back up right after it quickly closes saying something with "Fatal Error" If I exit Maple Story and start it up it works fine and I can turn Maple back on again.
Anyone know why it does this and if it's safe to continue running it like this?
Help extremely appreciated =D
[please only answer if you know what you're talking about..]

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

ok lets get this over with -.-

when i run my server, i generally have about 10-20 other applications running and it works fine. does that answer your question?

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @ElectroScape ElectroScape
item.description:
@ElectroScape wrote:

BTW akazuk you missed something out, if he wanted that he would have then done that and said, why does it say it already has a listener in that port so you just chang the port. i know thats not what you wanted, but i needed to say it

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

I don’t run my Mopar Client while I’m not actual playing…
and there’s nothing with Fatal Error in my files.

I’m just asking why I can’t sometimes run both my server and Maple Story and wondering if this could damage my computer >_<

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

[quote=“Simply Z3R0, post:8, topic:79020”]no… I’ll play it before I run my server.
I’m bored of Mopar and RS but other people like my server so I was gonna’ keep it up whilist I played.

It’s not a huge problem I just don’t know if it could do something to my computer >_<[/quote]
No it will not. It is just the MoparScape Client. If you looked in your Server Files and clicked on the Client NotePad then you can find it saying “Fatal Error.”

~Mike

Read full topic

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

no it isn’t since I never get this sort of error when running two servers.

this whole fatal error crap I’m not sure if it’s safe to have the server and the game on at same time, once the server crashes I get the error if I try to start it but it stops if I turn the game off…

item.title: Why does this happen?
item.dc:creator: @Akazuk Akazuk
item.description:
@Akazuk wrote:

u can run more servers at the same time but depends how good you’re computer is … if u want a server to have more “prioriti” and another to be more “ignored” press ctrl+alt+del >> processes >> select the operation and right clic on it >>set priority … hope that helps you !

Read full topic
